structure.unit: ARTICLE CLIV. HILLEL PLAT STREET LIGHTING SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT

text.section: In accordance with the provisions of of the Code of Miami-Dade County, Florida, a special taxing district, to be known and designated as the HILLEL PLAT STREET LIGHTING SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT is hereby created and established in the unincorporated area of Miami-Dade County.
